resources.string: Values can explain our behavior and attitudes. One of the reasons why we may be satisfied with one employer but feel uncomfortable with another employer could be hidden within our values. Understanding our own personal values may help navigate professional development at a suitable company. Just click on SURVEY MY VALUES to find out your personal values!

Companies differ by their corporate cultures which are usually conveyed by corporate values statements. Yet, the real sense of a corporate culture at a particular company may be captured through subjective personal feel. This perception we might get at informational/job interviews and while networking with professionals from a particular company. To learn more about your vision of a company’s values click SURVEY EMPLOYER’S VALUES!
As a guiding principle in my life, this value is...
As a business guiding principle for the company, this value is...

The information provided in this application is for educational and entertainment purposes only. The survey results are not intended to diagnose any disease or conditions, and may not be used by health care professionals to recommend a treatment.
